translation.IAmAFullstack: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer
translation.AboutMeText: I am passionate about creating innovative web and mobile applications with a simple and intuitive user interface. My skills are focused on modern and scalable technologies and I am always eager for new challenges to improve my skills. My ultimate goal is to offer the best possible user experience through my work. With my experience and dedication, I am confident in my ability to bring your ideas to life.
translation.Name: Name
translation.APIRestDevelopmentDescription: I build back-end systems according to the RESTful architecture tailored to your project, creating efficient, versatile, secure, and scalable microservice applications.
translation.FrontEndDevelopmentDescription: I make your projects come to life as websites or cross-platform apps (Android and IOS) with a user interface that is as intuitive as it is beautiful and adaptable to all screens.
translation.CloudArchitectureDescription: I adapt systems to work on cloud servers such as Amazon Web Services and Azure, having high availability, elasticity, and improving scalability.
translation.DatabaseManagementDescription: I store your and your customers' information in databases, whether relational or non-relational, making the data accessible to your applications in a secure way.
translation.ScalableMicroservicesDescription: I adapt large systems into small independent blocks, these blocks are microservices, each with its specific functionality, ensuring quick and effective scalability.
translation.SecureApplicationsDescription: I build your system with security methods that ensure that both the application logins are secure and dynamic, and sensitive data encrypted in the database.
